brainly_data.question: You have a coupon for an additional 25% off of any sale item at a store.the store has put a robotics kit on sale for 15% of the off the original price of $40. what is the price of the robotics kit after both discounts?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: You have a coupon for an additional 25% off of any sale item at a store.the store has put a robotics kit on sale for 15% of the off the original price of $40. what is the price of the robotics kit after both discounts?
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text: You take the 15% of the $40 first, moving the price to $34, then you take out 25% of that $34. Leaving your total at $25.5

top_answer.question: You have a coupon for an additional 25% off of any sale item at a store.the store has put a robotics kit on sale for 15% of the off the original price of $40. what is the price of the robotics kit after both discounts?
top_answer.subject: Mathematics
top_answer.text: You take the 15% of the $40 first, moving the price to $34, then you take out 25% of that $34. Leaving your total at $25.5
